channel.title: Meditate on null
channel.description: Recent content in Meditate on null

item.title: Temple Retreat &
item.description: When talking about what it’s like to have a retreat in a temple, Biao said they ask you to do all kinds of chores, this and that, not a minute of break, so to make sure you don’t have time to overthink. That’s my work @ ALDI. You need to work non-stop all the chores. They make sure you don’t have time to drink or pee. That’s how hard it is.
